## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cb1d2f963982b051c70a7149ccd500d8e39c022b77ea0da9a8bfeb10959bf8e8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'x2vml-gml' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
